quote_time_case: Between nine and ten of the clock
quote_last:
,” said Trumpkin.
“Just when we were at the railway station!” said all the children, and looked at one another with shining eyes.
title: Prince Caspian
author: C.S. Lewis

quote_first: He stopped, dried the sweat from his forehead, and took a minute to look for the sun. The day was completely gray and without shade. It must have been
quote_last: . The shooting continued relentlessly up ahead. He trampled on.
title: Faith Alone: The Heart of Everything
author: Bo Giertz
